list.name: Changes
list.comment:
fix: update UNSPLASH_REDIRECT_URI to resolve error
- Temporarily removed .env from .gitignore - Edited app.py to handle OAuth flow for Unsplash - Updated requirements.txt with necessary packages

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Vcs Important Messages": "VCS important messages", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Vcs Important Messages": "true", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "WebServerToolWindowFactoryState": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "last_opened_file_path": "/Users/brightdarko/sentify-server", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.jetbrains.python.configuration.PyActiveSdkModuleConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
fix: Resolve RuntimeError for Werkzeug web server in production
- Added allow_unsafe_werkzeug=True to socketio.run() method to bypass the error during development. - Updated requirements.txt to include python-unsplash package. - Adjusted package versions to ensure compatibility and stability.
